name: openrouter-usage
description: Show remaining OpenRouter key limit in the VS Code status bar

openrouterUsage.apiKey.markdownDescription: Your OpenRouter API key (sk-or-v1-...). Stored in plain text. Alternatively set the OPENROUTER_API_KEY environment variable.

openrouterUsage.refreshIntervalMinutes.markdownDescription: Minutes between automatic refreshes of OpenRouter usage. Set to 0 to disable auto refresh.
